__e: Well, I've been thinking about this, and I've decided... the best way for everyone- you know, for you and me... for the C.I.A., for Mr. Azenauer-
I'd be happy to sign the company over to you... if you see a way out. If you can come up with something... i'll give it a try.
She's like a CIA agent for happy families.
Why the CIA doesn't want me in the picture?
Instruct the CIA to contact you at your home.
A covert department of the CIA, the Special Activities Division has activated a kill contract on you.
And the CIA placed you with Drax, correct?
Why are people in the CIA trying to stop us... from saving the world?
I want to know what the damn CIA.
Now, what's the ClA doing here?
You don't walk around, kill a C.I.A. Field agent... and continue to walk around.
Well... since you're no longer director of CIA, and I am, it doesn't matter what you think.
Are you trying to tell me people in the CIA and FBI are going to help with this project?
You're working for the company again.
Well, this is the industrial accident policy that the company carries.
